kpi_info.title: Number of PDCCH order attempts
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of PDCCH order attempts (including PDCCH order repetitions). UPDATED: Transmission of a PDCCH order (eNB -> UE; 3GPP TS 36.321, TS 36.212) to initiate a UE Random Access. This counter is not only updated when the first (initial) PDCCH order is transmitted to a UE, but this counter is also updated with PDCCH order transmission repetitions.
